name: Social or Personal Circumstances SnCT
description: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes the describes a social or personal circumstance of the patient. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CDA Care Setting Type subset with subset original id 941000000130.
